name: adaptworldwide
title: Adapt Worldwide Company Website
blurb: Creation of a new company website for Adapt Worldwide, the client main requirment was a minimal design focused on the content and information delivery, expressed request for use of customised icons over images.

name: ukwokecities
title: UK's most Woke Cities
blurb: This was a one page Implementation to the Bankrate website in React, consisting in the design and development of a landing page containing an interactive table of UK most progressive locations to live, I partook to all aspect of the project including prototyping the page and the design of an small customised icon set.

name: rockpopfashion
title: Rock & Pop Fashion Hall of Fame
blurb: This was a digital marketing content peace for Groupon which involved an interactve gallery of illustrated outfits that music Artists have worn trough History, my role on this project covered all aspect of it includng illustrations and development.

name: juiceticeleague
title: The Juice-Tice League
blurb: This extremelly silly but extremelly efficent marketing tool was a collaboration between the agency I worked for and European illustrator and contemporary artist Fulvio Obregon. The scope of the project was to increase the SEO visibility of the newly at the time Plenish, using the popular DC comic superheroes as subjects, due to the fact the the Justice League movie was upon realease.

name: historyofcards
title: The History of playing Cards
blurb: This a simple static infographic created for online betting giant VegasSlot, the Infographic is an illustrated timeline of the history of playing cards, I fully worked on this project using Adobe Illustrator with different digital illustrator tecniques.

name: thomaspossamai
title: Thomas Passamai Photography
blurb: Project creation of a one-page website portfolio, started on a basic bootstrap template as base and implemented with javascript photogalleries and other simple elements, designed to higlight the magical photography of the photographer and owner of the website Thomas Possamai.

name: iconicweddingdresses
title: 100 Most Iconic Wedding Dresses
blurb: This extremelly sucessfull idea, which many online magazine have mentioned for years following the creation was a digital content revelation, due to client request this website if ully build from stractch with pure javascript and no use of libraries, including the multisearch system for filtering dresses, the simple design and the style has been created by me with the help of a fashion designer who illustrated litterally hundred wedding dresses that have been wore by royal, politicians and various celebrities.

name: cardtournaments
title: Biggest Cards tournaments
blurb: This colorful infographic was an acclaimed peace of digital information, created with the intention to not be overfill with illustration in order to get a clear understanding to satsfy the curiosity of whomever would be interested in the top prizes in card tournament.
